article: a kansas church group that planned to demonstrate at the funerals of five amish girls killed in an attack on their one-room schoolhouse has dropped the picket plans , a reversal that came hours after the state 's governor offered the amish police protection .
abstract: protesters drop plans to picket pennsylvania amish funerals
